<[[http://aerospace.honeywell.com]]> <[[http://aerospace.honeywell.com]]> Facebook <[[https://www.facebook.com/HoneywellAero]]> LinkedIn <[[https://www.linkedin.com/company/honeywell-aerospace]]> Twitter <[[https://twitter.com/Honeywell_Aero?ref_src=twsrc%5Egoogle%7Ctwcamp%5Eserp%7Ctwgr%5Eauthor]]> YouTube <[[https://www.youtube.com/user/HoneywellAviation]]> Facebook <[[http://www.Facebook.com/DuncanAviation]]> LinkedIn <[[https://www.linkedin.com/company/duncan-aviation]]> Twitter <[[https://twitter.com/DuncanAviation?ref_src=twsrc%5Egoogle%7Ctwcamp%5Eserp%7Ctwgr%5Eauthor]]> YouTube <[[https://www.youtube.com/user/DuncanAviation56]]> The Citation 560 ADS-B Out STC by Duncan Aviation Features the Honeywell Primus II Radio System
ADS-B Out
Fly today with a complete solution and prepare for the future with the ADS-B Out STC for Cessna Citation 560/560XL by Duncan Aviation. By Jan.1, 2020, all operators must have Automatic Dependent Surveillance-Broadcast capability. As a staple in NextGen technology, ADS-B Out increases efficiency, strengthens situational awareness and allows aircraft to transmit information to Air Traffic Control ground stations by using satellite signals instead of ground radar and navigational aids. As a result, these signals improve tracking and give the pilot a clear view of their surroundings – allowing them to see what Air Traffic Control sees.
Under Duncan Aviation's ADS-B Out STC# ST01810W, operators can take advantage of:
- Reduced separation and highly accurate departure and arrival times
- Surveillance in areas that do not currently have radar coverage
- A clear view of vehicles and runways in order to avoid collisions or delays
- More efficient spacing and optimal routing in non-radar environments, including the busy airspace in the Gulf of Mexico, mountainous regions of Colorado and the lower altitudes of Alaska.
Honeywell's Primus II Radio System When you upgrade your existing Honeywell Primus® II Radio and add a stand-alone GPS receiver, you’ll enjoy a cost-effective solution combined with the latest configuration to meet the ADS-B Out mandate. Fly with confidence with Honeywell's Primus II Radio equipped with a Mode C or Mode S Transponder to fulfill ADS-B Out requirements and ensure your future travel plans.
Duncan Aviation's ADS-B Out Program
Upgrade your Citation 560/560XL with an integrated solution at any Duncan Aviation maintenance facility: Lincoln, Nebraska; Battle Creek, Michigan; Provo, Utah; or at any of their satellite shop locations throughout the United States*. Learn More <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/ADS-BOutCampaign_6.1SoftwareUpgrade.html]]> Privacy Statement <[[http://honeywell.com/Privacy]]> © 2016 Honeywell International Inc. <[[http://www.honeywell.com]]> Terms & Conditions <[[http://honeywell.com/Pages/TermsConditions.aspx]]>
